com.itko.lisaint

Class LisaJdbcDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.p6spy.engine.spy.P6SpyDriverCore
      • com.itko.lisaint.LisaJdbcDriver
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.sql.Driver

    public class LisaJdbcDriver
extends com.p6spy.engine.spy.P6SpyDriverCore
implements java.sql.Driver
    A jdbc driver wrapper class which intercepts jdbc calls and makes them available to LISA test cases when the test case is executed (if server-side LISA integration is enabled).
